queries.name: Ordered
queries.query: update Itemorder set status=:data where status=:data2

queries.name: _Total_Price
queries.query: select sum(p.PRICE) from PRODUCT P,ITEMORDER I where P.ID=I.PRODUCT_ID and status=:data

queries.name: cancelled
queries.query: update Itemorder set status=:data where id=:data1

queries.name: _Total_InCart
queries.query: select count(status) as total from Itemorder where status= 'In Cart'

queries.name: _OrderedLists
queries.query: select  i.ID as id,p.ID as pid, p.NAME as name,i.QUANTITY as quantity,i.STATUS as status from ITEMORDER i,Product p where ( i.PRODUCT_ID=p.ID and i.status!='In Cart') and i.USER_ID=:LoggedinUserID
